sentence in indonesian using the words: Saya ingin pergi ke Belanda untuk liburan musim panas.
english translation: I want to go to the Netherlands for a summer vacation.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Tolong beri tahu saya tempat yang tepat untuk belok kanan.
english translation: Please tell me the right place to make a right turn.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Saya belum pernah mencoba makanan itu sebelumnya.
english translation: I haven't tried that food yet.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Hari ini cuaca sangat tidak biasa.
english translation: The weather today is very unusual.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Saya belum pernah melihat hal semacam ini sebelumnya.
english translation: I have never seen anything like this before.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Saya naik bemo ke pasar setiap hari.
english translation: I take a bemo to the market every day.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Bendera negara kita dikibarkan dengan bangga di sana.
english translation: Our country's flag is proudly flown there.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Mobil saya sedang diperbaiki di bengkel saat ini.
english translation: My car is being repaired at the workshop right now.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Bola memiliki bentuk yang bulat.
english translation: A ball has a round shape.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Kami harus menghormati semua orang yang beragama berbeda.
english translation: We should respect everyone who practices different religions.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Saya senang duduk di beranda dan menikmati secangkir kopi.
english translation: I love sitting on the porch and enjoying a cup of coffee.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Kami akan berangkat ke Bandara Internasional besok pagi.
english translation: We will depart for the International Airport tomorrow morning.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Dia sangat berani menghadapi semua rintangan yang dihadapinya.
english translation: He is very brave in facing all the obstacles he encounters.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Berapa harga buku itu?
english translation: How much is the price of that book?

sentence in indonesian using the words: Berapa harga tiket masuk ke taman ini?
english translation: How much does the entrance ticket to this park cost?

sentence in indonesian using the words: Saya sudah pergi ke Paris dua kali.
english translation: I have been to Paris twice.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Berapa lama waktu tempuh dari Jakarta ke Surabaya dengan kereta api?
english translation: How long is the travel time from Jakarta to Surabaya by train?

sentence in indonesian using the words: Berapa tahun Anda telah bekerja di perusahaan ini?
english translation: How many years have you been working in this company?

sentence in indonesian using the words: Saya berasal dari sebuah kota kecil di pedesaan.
english translation: I come from a small town in the countryside.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Dia sangat pandai berbahasa Inggris.
english translation: He is very fluent in speaking English.
